metadata.title: CVE-2017-15288 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
The compilation daemon in Scala before 2.10.7, 2.11.x before 2.11.12, and2.12.x before 2.12.4 uses weak permissions for private files in/tmp/scala-devel/${USER:shared}/scalac-compile-server-port, which allowslocal users to write to arbitrary class files and consequently gainprivileges.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-15288` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

scala - 2.11.12-2
scala-library - 2.11.12-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: scala package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.11.12-2').
